DOC.brief_title: Metabolomic Embryo Profiles Obese Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Patients Their Relationship With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCO )
DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 kg/m2 Age < 38 year old Non smoker First IVF cycle ( group 2 & 3 , Control group ) Normal uterus ( see ultrasound ) normal basal hormonal profile ( FSH , LH , estradiol , testosterone , androstenedione , insulin , SHBG , glucose , AMH ) Antral follicle count ( > 5 FA ovary ) Menses every 2535 day . < 5 > 20 oocyte retrieve stimulation cycle estradiol > 3000 pg/ml progesterone > 1,5 ng/ml hCG day . < 2 evolutive embryos culture medium .
